info.name: Job board
info.description:
This document outlines the API functionalities for our job search platform, catering to both users and administrators.

Our platform simplifies the job search process for users by offering a vast array of jobs across diverse industries and locations. Our user-friendly search tools empower users to find jobs matching their skillsets and interests. Advanced filtering options allow for precise job hunting, streamlining the application process.

response.name: invalid emaill
email or password is not provided

}

request.description: Retrieves a list of available job categories.

request.description: Retrieves a list of companies with basic information.
Gets detailed information about a specific company.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "TWD",
  "website": "https://TWD.com",
  "logo": "binary_data_of_your_logo_image",  // Replace with actual logo data in BLOB format
  "description": "We are a company dedicated to creating innovative products and services.",
  "location": "Cairo",
  "industry": "Technology",
  "owner_user_id": 1  // Assuming this is the user ID of the company owner
}
